Rulings.Edison:
●You can't activate Pot of Avarice while Transmigration Break is active.
●You can activate Cyberdark Impact! while Transmigration Break is active, but the Cyberdark Monsters are removed from play instead of being returned to the Deck.
●If an effect would return a Fusion Monster in the GY to its owner's hand or Extra Deck, the Fusion Monster is removed from play instead.

Rulings.Base: 1. You cannot activate "Pot of Avarice" while "Transmigration Break" is active.\n2. You can activate "Cyberdark Impact!" while "Transmigration Break" is active, but the "Cyberdark" Monsters are removed from play instead of being returned to the Deck.\n3. If an effect would return a Fusion Monster in the GY to its owner's hand or Extra Deck, the Fusion Monster is removed from play instead.
